description: Lunches and snacks and dinners, oh, my! Back to school means a lot of meals to get ready with less time, but no worries- we're here to help! Join us for our Back to School Vendor Fair, where we'll be joined by some of our favorite vendors to provide inspiration for school days eats.
name: Back to School Vendor Fair

description: Our in-house Oktoberfest release is one of our favorite days of the year! Come say "o'zapft is" with us -- we'll have German food specials running all weekend and 11x17 prints of our Oktoberfest poster wil be available for purchase. Prost!
name: Oktoberfest Release

description: It's the MGoBlog Football Eve Party, presented by Homesure Lending! Join us at 7:30 for Michigan Football talk with the fine folks at MGoBlog and brews courtesy of Homesure (register at the link below -- Homesure is picking up the first round!). And don't forget -- September 1 is also our in-house Oktoberfest release! Come and welcome fall and football season with us.
name: MGoBlog Football Eve Party

description:
enjoii welcome week the right way with ur fave indie boyzz and grrlz.

My Girlfriend Beru: They rock, they roll, they have a sweet cream filling. Catch their first Ann Arbor show since the spring!

FB: https://www.facebook.com/mygirlfriendberu/?fref=ts
Tunes: https://mygirlfriendberu.bandcamp.com/

Seaholm: A2's spiciest meme rock band will be blowing fat clouds as they ride their skateboards across campus and probably fall off.

FB: https://www.facebook.com/seaholmbandmi/?fref=ts
Tunes: https://seaholm.bandcamp.com/releases

Dogleg: Trying to go fast? Dogleg is a fast poppy punky emo band that will fulfill all your speedy needs.

FB: https://www.facebook.com/doglegdog/?fref=ts
Tunes: https://dogleg.bandcamp.com/

CATTY CLUB: Garage rock rebel girls from Detroit City coming to A2 to rock yr socks off.

FB: https://www.facebook.com/CATTYCLUBDETROIT/?fref=ts
Tunes: https://soundcloud.com/cattyclub

Dummy Bears: A2/NY based sadboiii rock to help you remember all your teenage feelings and their meanings, and whether or not they are too see-through to be true.

FB: https://www.facebook.com/dummybears/?fref=ts
Tunes: https://dummybears.bandcamp.com/


DOORS @ 8
BANDS @ 8:30
$5 / $7 FOR UNDER 21S
THIS IS AN 18+ SHOW AND THE VENUE WILL BE CHECKING IDS
name: My Girlfriend Beru // Seaholm // Dogleg // Catty Club // Dummy Bears

description:
UMMA and Arts at Michigan celebrate Welcome Week by introducing new University of Michigan students to the wide array of possibilities for arts participation on campus. This evening event will feature live music and performances, WCBN DJs, dance, poetry, film, games, prizes, and a variety of art-making activities.
Artscapade! is generously supported by the University of Michigan Credit Union Arts Adventures Program, UMMA's Lead Sponsor for Student and Family Engagement, and co- sponsored by Arts at Michigan.
name: Artscapade!

description:
Nights at the Museum, UMMA’s first-ever exterior media art initiative, is open to the public, and will run from September 2-9 from 8:30 p.m. to dawn along its State Street-side facade.

Nights at the Museum begins Friday, Sept. 2, during Artscapade!, a Welcome Week event for new U-M students, and concludes on Friday, Sept. 9 at UMMA’s twice-annual After Hours community celebration.

On Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, from dusk to dawn, UMMA will showcase a digital art installation by Quayola called Pleasant Places. Inspired by the work of Vincent Van Gogh, Quayola has returned to the same countryside of Provence 125 years later to create of a series of digital paintings exploring the boundary between representation and abstraction. Pleasant Places will also be projected overnight throughout the remainder of the week. 

For the Full Schedule Check Here: http://www.umma.umich.edu/news/2016/umma-to-light-up-campus-with-nights-at-the-museum
name: Nights at the Museum

description: We're firing up the grill early to start our first tailgating weekend! Our butchers make special footlong sausages for our team to grill up, and we'll have special sides from the deli, all just $5 a plate.
name: Tailgating $5 Footlong Sausages
